hypothesis_content.title: Low Float Altcoin Breakout Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, low-float altcoins (SKY, TRUMP) will exhibit explosive momentum when 1h volume exceeds 20x 20-period average while price breaks above 24h consolidation range (defined as <3% range over 24h).
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low-float coins require minimal volume for large moves. Consolidation breaks with volume spikes indicate accumulation completion. Current 'market momentum builds' news suggests latent momentum seeking expression in small caps.
entry_conditions: Asset (SKY or TRUMP) has been in <3% price range for past 24h
Price breaks above 24h range high with ≥2% clearance

exit_conditions.time_exit: 8 hours after entry if no stop/target hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume spikes fail to sustain momentum, resulting in false breakouts >70% of occurrences, or momentum dissipates within 2h.
